data.author: koide3
data.message:
Merge pull request #60 from esteve/add-build-dependency

build(ndt_omp): add ros_environment dependency (#20)

data.author: Esteve Fernandez
data.message:
build(ndt_omp): add ros_environment dependency (#20)

Needed so that `CMakeLists.txt` can access the `$ROS_VERSION` environment variable in the ROS buildfarm

Signed-off-by: Esteve Fernandez <esteve.fernandez@tier4.jp>

data.author: koide3
data.message:
Merge pull request #57 from pjreed/install-ros2-artifacts

Install ROS2 library

data.author: P. J. Reed
data.message:
Use ament_auto_add_library instead of add_library

The regular `add_library` function did not cause `ament_auto_package`
to install the library, but this one will.

Signed-off-by: P. J. Reed <phillipreed@hatchbed.com>

data.author: k.koide
data.message:
Fix segfault

- for hessian calculation, use the same voxel search method as jacobian calculation
- computeDerivatives() could return different scores for a same parameter. This phenomenon stems from the parallelization that can change the point processing order that result in different results due to floating point computation.

data.message: possible bug in the MT?
